message: To start off, we're looking for an Erlang developer to improve an in-house developed Erlang daemon that handles a high volume of transactions. Remote ok.
@yrashk looks interesting, I'll send you an email. Our technologies already look like a good match (OTP and RabbitMQ) :)
Not sure how people take to this, but thought I'd start a job topic to see where it takes us.
@wil our company (spawngrid.com) offers this kind of services at a reasonable rate for select clients. Feel free to drop us an email to hi@spawngrid.com
Already pretty well known, but Basho is hiring as well. http://www.basho.com/company_careers.php See you guys at Erlang Factory SF!
